articles.title: Nigerian lawyer wins American Bar Association international human rights award - TheCable
articles.description: Adeola Oyinlade, a Nigerian human rights lawyer, has won the 2021 American Bar Association (ABA) international human rights award.
articles.content:
Adeola Oyinlade, a Nigerian human rights lawyer, has won the 2021 American Bar Association (ABA) international human rights award.

articles.title: 'Most unvaccinated Americans see jabs as greater risk than Covid' - CanIndia News
articles.description: Most unvaccinated American adults don't believe the Covid-19 vaccines are very effective and see the jabs as a greater health risk than the virus itself,
articles.content:
Most unvaccinated American adults don’t believe the Covid-19 vaccines are very effective and see the jabs as a greater health risk than the virus itself, a new survey has revealed.
